And a few weeks of trial and error taught me I could not love a boy, not even one as gleaming and lovely as Thuy.  More than 30 years later, on the rare occasions I catch Zizanie on someone’s skin, I remember his taste, his lisp, his touch, and his tears.   But that, that’s not enough for love.
